# Popover 组件 showArrow=false 无效

`unconfirmed`

### Reproduction link

[https://github.com/RGBWang/rp-popover-showArrow](https://github.com/RGBWang/rp-popover-showArrow)

### Steps to reproduce

showArrow 设置false，界面依然出现白色三角箭头

### What is expected?

没有白色三角箭头

### What is actually happening?

有白色三角箭头

| ----------- | ------ |
| antd        | 5.6.4  |
| React       | 18.2.0 |
| System      | win10  |
| Browser     | edge   |
